A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Conflicting movie\, I want to love it\, but I just can't. If Force Awaken left audiences and fans debating\, speculating and engaged in what's to come\, TLJ will only be discussed on what did Disney do to Star Wars and who is the better director.  It's a real shame\, as I'm not interested or excited for episode 9 at all.
